INSERT INTO MEALKIT_BOARD(MEALKIT_NO, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEALKIT_NAME, MEALKIT_INFO, MEALKIT_INGREDIENTS, MEALKIT_PRICE, MEALKIT_REG_DATE, MEALKIT_INVENTORY, MEALKIT_CATEGORY, MEALKIT_IMAGE, STATUS, MEALKIT_TYPE) VALUES(MEALKIT_BOARD_seq.nextval, #{memberVO.memberEmail}, #{mealkitName}, #{mealkitInfo}, #{mealkitIngredients}, #{mealkitPrice}, SYSDATE, #{mealkitInventory}, #{mealkitCategory}, #{mealkitImage}, #{status}, #{mealkitType})
SELECT MEALKIT_BOARD_SEQ.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
mapper.select: SELECT M.MEALKIT_NO, M.MEALKIT_NAME, M.MEALKIT_INGREDIENTS, M.MEALKIT_PRICE, M.MEALKIT_REG_DATE, M.MEALKIT_EDIT_DATE, M.MEALKIT_INVENTORY, M.MEALKIT_CATEGORY, M.MEALKIT_IMAGE, M.MEALKIT_BOARD_HITS, M.MEALKIT_INFO, B.MEMBER_EMAIL, B.MEMBER_NICK FROM MEALKIT_BOARD M INNER JOIN MEMBER B ON M.MEMBER_EMAIL = B.MEMBER_EMAIL WHERE M.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY M.MEALKIT_NO DESC
mapper.update: update mealkit_board set status = 'N' where mealkit_no = #{value}
update mealkit_board set mealkit_board_hits = mealkit_board_hits + 1 where mealkit_no = #{value}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from mealkit_board
status = 'Y'
and mealkit_type = #{mealkitType}

SELECT rnum, mk.mealkit_no, mk.mealkit_name, mk.mealkit_board_hits, m.member_image,m.member_nick FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY
mealkit_reg_date DESC
COALESCE(r.av, 0) DESC, mealkit_reg_date DESC
mealkit_board_hits DESC, mealkit_reg_date desc
)AS rnum,
mkb.mealkit_no, mkb.mealkit_name, mkb.member_email, mkb.mealkit_board_hits FROM mealkit_board mkb
m.mealkit_no, COALESCE(r.av, 0), m.member_email,m.mealkit_board_hits, m.mealkit_name from mealkit_board m left join( SELECT MEALKIT_NO, ROUND(SUM(MEALKIT_STAR_SCORE) / COUNT(MEALKIT_NO),1) as av FROM MEALKIT_COMMENT MC INNER JOIN MEALKIT_STAR_SCORE MS ON MC.MEALKIT_COMMENT_ID = MS.MEALKIT_COMMENT_ID group by MC.mealkit_no ) r on m.mealkit_no = r.mealkit_no where m.status = 'Y' order by COALESCE(r.av, 0) desc
mealkit_type like '%' || #{mealkitType} || '%'
and mealkit_name like '%' || #{searchMealkit} || '%'
) mk INNER JOIN member m ON mk.member_email = m.member_email AND rnum BETWEEN #{pagination.startRowNumber} AND #{pagination.endRowNumber} ORDER BY rnum

select b.mealkit_image, b.mealkit_name, b.mealkit_board_hits, m.member_nick from mealkit_board b inner join member m on b.member_email = m.member_email where b.mealkit_name like '%' || #{mealkitName} || '%' and b.status = 'Y'
